properties.areaDesc: Emmet; Leelanau; Beaver Island and surrounding islands; Benzie; Manistee
properties.headline: Lakeshore Flood Warning issued February 14 at 10:14AM EST until February 15 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Gaylord MI
properties.description:
* WHAT...Significant lakeshore flooding expected.

* WHERE...Emmet, Leelanau, Benzie, Manistee and Beaver Island
and surrounding islands Counties.

* WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 6 PM EST Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Numerous roads closed and low lying property including
parking lots, lawns, and homes could be inundated near the lake.
Some shoreline erosion will occur.
properties.instruction:
If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be
closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of
unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone
property.

NWSheadline: LAKESHORE FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM EST SATURDAY
